name: Save the Citadel
description:
Submitted at playcrafting (virtual jam location of the Global Game Jam 2022)

Setting:
You are humanity's last hope! As worlds have come apart you drift through space, with only a citadel to start the colony that will hopefully grow, and become a new chance for our species.

How to play:
Grab incoming tiles to expand your colony.
Balance your economy while you prepare for upcoming threats.
But most importantly make sure you have sufficient power to activate your defenses before its too late! 

Controls: 
'Save the Citadel' can be played entirely with a mouse

LMB to select abilities on hexagons or buildings
MMB to move camera
RMB to deselect.
Scroll to zoom in and out

Palette we used as inspiration:
https://lospec.com/palette-list/steam-lords
